NAME: commit
DESCRIPTION: Commit a file to an application

NAME: file-list
DESCRIPTION: Get information about all files in a directory

NAME: file-read
DESCRIPTION: Read a file from a directory

NAME: file-create
DESCRIPTION: Create a file in the specified directory

NAME: statistics
DESCRIPTION: Get statistics information about the host

NAME: app-list
DESCRIPTION: Get a list of all applications

NAME: create-config-file
DESCRIPTION: Create a config file to upload an application
